verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
{Nayaleta mbele yenu matendo ya Mungu
Nayasimulia wazi matendo ya Mungu

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
kwa sauti tamu ni matendo ya Mungu
Mwendo wa kunesa ni matendo ya Mungu yasikieni } 2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Farao alipokuwa mgumu,
Fimbo ya Musa ikawa nyoka hatari, ona

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Bahari ikasimama ukuta,
Naye israeli akapita pakavu, ona

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Kina Shedraki walipochomwa moto
Wakatembea huku na kule wazima, ona

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Jiwe kubwa kaburini kwa Yesu,
Likampisha akatoka hai kama mwanzo, ona

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Nyimbo hizi na midundo ni vyake
Asifiwe na ahimidiwe milele, ona
